#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(a, b, i) for (int i = a; i < b; ++i)

typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;

int main() {
  int test;
  cin >> test;
  while (test--) {
    string s;
    int k;
    cin >> s >> k;
    int r = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i) {
      r *= 10;
      r += s[i] - '0';
      r %= k;
    }
    cout << (r == 0 ? "YES\n" : "NO\n");
  }
}
